title: Server-Side Request Forgery in URL Fetcher
description: The URL fetcher functionality at /fetch.php is vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) attacks. The application makes HTTP requests to user-supplied URLs without proper validation.
steps_to_reproduce:
1. Navigate to https://vulnerable-app.com/fetch.php
2. Enter http://127.0.0.1:22 in the URL field
3. Click Fetch
4. The application will attempt to connect to the SSH service on localhost
5. Monitor network traffic to confirm the connection attempt
